View on GitHub

SL2017

The SL2017 Danish National Scout Jamboree App Suite

All reports from volunteers are carbon copied to the Caretakers Journal.

The Security Detail and camp management watches the judge list and trials reports at their discretion. Offenders will see every report sticking to their profile and they are welcomed to questioning the report. If the Security Detail rejects the questioning of the report, the offender may take his issue with the report to the camp management for review. Dismissed reports are removed from the participants profile and erased from the judge list.

SL2017 maintained by sl2017

Published with GitHub Pages
